roadway_dispersion
Class pollutant_type

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--roadway_dispersion.pollutant_type
public class pollutant_type
extends java.lang.Object

Overview
The pollutant type class is a simple way to store information about pollutants. This class stores the name, descrition, moecular weight of CO and SF6 and allows the user to store information about other pollutants as well.

Version:
1.0 (October 2001)
Author:
Tony Held
